website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy S10 Plus is an outstanding phone for 2019, although serious photographers will find its nighttime camera shots lacking. Competition, including from the upcoming Galaxy Note 10, is mounting.
pros: The Galaxy S10 Plus has a phenomenal AMOLED screen, monster battery life and loads of useful camera tools
The option to wirelessly charge another device is convenient and really works
cons: Nighttime and low-light shots on the Galaxy S10 Plus aren't as clear or crisp as dedicated night modes on the Pixel 3 and Huawei Mate 20 Pro
The ultrasonic in-screen fingerprint reader isn't always fast or accurate
Mispresses on the curved, edge-to-edge display are a minor annoyance

customer_reviews.title: Nerdgasm!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived promptly and exactly as advertised. Factory unlocked? Check. 12Gb RAM? CHECK. 1Tb of storage? Check. I use this phone with Straight Talk and it was simply a matter of popping in the SIM and having Straight Talk activate it on their Network. No hassles at all. Both the seller and this product get my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee Pettimore III

customer_reviews.title: Samsung hit a homerun with this phone! 5/5☆
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. The camera is fantastic, shooting pictures and videos is a breeze, and the quality is great. The fingerprint reader is fast, and sensitive enough to work even when there are small obstructions (dust & debris from my workplace, for instance.) The sound quality from both speakers is great, both in volume and clarity, I love how loud this phone can get, when I feel like blasting my music! The processor is fast, I can run multiple high-CPU-taxing games simultaneously with little to no lag or disconnections. If you're considering buying this phone, DO IT.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rickerl

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Had to get an update for bluetooth before it would work. So if you get it, try not to get frustrated. Just keep checking for updates if something doesn't work just right
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! With good camera quality and realiable battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Gareitz Rapola

customer_reviews.title: Fast and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great phone so far. Just started using it yesterday. Battery life is fantastic and with the 12GB RAM I am able to jump between apps with very little delay.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Wifi and Data Intermittent Issue
customer_reviews.text: The Wifi and Data constantly go in and out. Phone is unusable. For the price this is completely unacceptable. Will never purchase Samsung or through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: 1 tb internal memory
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone to replace a Samsung Galaxy S10 with 512 memory. Seems I'm always stuffing my phone with pictures and download music. They fill up fast. I love Samsung products and again never disappointed. Has all the bells and whistles I want and then some. I was careful not to install junk apps. Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It is very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like working with it. It combines a cell phone with a camera, internet, ebook, a pedometer, and other apps. It combines several items into one small package. I am never without a phone or internet. It is a great item. I am never without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: returned item
customer_reviews.text: its a good phone. I didn't use it because the wrong phone was sent out. I've returned it but wasnt issued a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jumpmasta

customer_reviews.title: Potentially Misleading Seller
customer_reviews.text: Giving 3 stars because product is listed as NEW, but upon arrival the paperwork included in the package stated that the phone was refurbished. The phone arrived in great condition, but if the phones being sold are in fact refurbs, that should be disclosed in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: devrick13

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10+ Factory Unlocked Android Cell Phone | US Version | 1TB of Storage | Fingerprint ID and Facial Recognition | Long-Lasting Battery | U.S. Warranty | Ceramic Black
product_meta.description: Style:S10+| Size:1TB| Color:BlackThe next generation Samsung Galaxy S10+ is as powerful, intelligent and intuitive as you are, providing endless possibilities and next- level power in performance, productivity, creation and design. Known as the Da Vinci of smartphones, the Galaxy S10 features pro lenses to capture stunning photos and the S-Pen to easily create content and utilize your smartphone’s full capabilities. Get more from your S10 with all new creative features such as Single Take AI, Pro Video, and more. Advanced low light technology in the pro lenses gives you the ability to shoot with long exposure-style captures so your content features striking light trails. Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button and then easily and quickly share more, quicker. The Galaxy S10+ features a powerful processor, intelligent power and a long-lasting battery that learns your habits and adapts to your screen usage in order to optimize power and performance. With Unlocked by Samsung, you get to choose the carrier, data plan, services, features and apps you want.
feature_bullets: Updated Camera Features: Get the more powerful S10 with a software update that gives you all new features including Single Take AI, Pro Video and more

High-quality camera lenses: With a full set of pro lenses, including ultrawide for stunning landscapes and micro-zoom for epic details, Galaxy S10+ is a studio in your pocket, featuring live video bokeh, precision audio focus and super-stabilization
Photos and video with one tap: capture multiple images and video all at once, in one tap. Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time
Capture with pro-grade tool set made for masters: Control your camera settings with Pro-Video Mode to adjust the exposure, focus and more to bring your creative vision to life
Share more, quicker: The Galaxy S10+ can now connect to and share with up to 5 other compatible devices at the same time using Bluetooth and WiFi, with no limits on content type or file size

Sleek Design: Samsung Galaxy S10+ boasts a super-slim design that fits comfortably in your pocket and easily sits in the hand. A 6.4” endless quad HD+ dynamic AMOLED screen with nearly bezel-less infinity display offers a cinematic viewing experience

All-day Battery: Fast-charging, long-lasting intelligent power features super-speed processing, Wireless PowerShare, and massive storage, and tailors battery usage to how you live and work to optimize battery life to last all day

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
